{{fr-noun|m}}

# [[decision tree]] {{gloss|visualization of a complex decision-making situation in which the possible decisions and their likely outcomes are organized in the form of a graph that resembles a tree}}
types.html:
arbre de décision m (plural arbres de décision)

  1. decision tree (visualization of a complex decision-making situation in which the possible decisions and their likely outcomes are organized in the form of a graph that resembles a tree)

title: arbre de décision
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /aʁ.bʁə də de.si.zjɔ̃/
